attributes.action: Make Urmston the Official Capital City of England
attributes.additional_details: Urmston is a small village situated 6 miles Southwest of Manchester City Centre. It was originally a farming village until the arrival of the railway in 1873. Urmston is home to an amazing congregation of people and is a warm and loving community. It boasts a wonderful selection of public houses, hairdressers and curry houses. The people of Urmston have a vision. We have a vision of a better world, not only for us, but for the children. We aim to make this world a better place for everyone. Amongst other things, we aim to cut taxes on, petrol, beer and cigs. We aim to improve national healthcare and education. And we aim to improve public transport. However, we cannot do this alone. Together, we can not only make Urmston the Capital City of England, but we can transform the way the country operates. Together we can make a difference, Your signature can make the difference, You can make this world a better place. Thank you for reading and thank you for your support.
